name: 2nd Global Cell and Gene Therapy Summit
content: We invite you to The Global Cell & Gene Therapy Summit in Orlando, FL, from July 7 to 9, 2025\. Join us as a delegate, sponsor, exhibitor, or speaker to discuss the latest in cell & gene therapy. The three-day event features talk, poster presentations, workshops, discussions, and networking opportunities, providing a platform to learn from experts, showcase research, gain practical insights, and connect with professionals. This summit fosters collaboration and innovation, bridging the gap between academia and industry to advance the field of cell & gene therapy. Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to stay up-to-date and contribute to the future of this vital field.
